parameters: We understand, this is not the advanture for you now.\|
Hope you find better advanture in your world.
I have no choice. I’ve spent so much time here,
but this place... it’s not where I belong anymore.
I’ll miss you too, Alice. You may be leaving, but your story
You’ve changed everything for the better.
Welcome to the land of cration, where our creators reside.
Are your sure this is the place?
But it was true that it was empty, prehabs they reached deadline.
Oh, yeah. One is called Ivaelon, the shaper of the world.\|
The other is the Ekros, the master of all life.
But how did get back to our land?
Oh, you can go back with this. The transfer stone.\|
Like it's name can teleport you to different place.
Alright, let's move on to the hero's hall.
It's a place holds the sprits of story that come to a end.\|
Maybe you can meet up a few old firends there.
Then what are you waiting for, move on.
we can take a break here.
Do you want to take a break?
\>Do you want to save your Progress?
Alice? how did you get here?\|
No, I was here to see the creators
It's nice to see you have, I still want you to be my friend.
If we meet again in your new story.
It's you, thanks for stop Luby from that insane plan.
If we meet again, I will be sure to invite you for a drink.
It's you... you are the one that heping Luby.\|
Robin... I didn’t expect to see you here.
It’ll ruin that adorable face of yours.
I almost forgot about your cheap chatter.\|
Every time you open your mouth, I feel like sewing it shut.
Hahaha! Then I guess I should talk even more,\.
just to make sure you’ll never forget me!
So... You’ve finally decided to go back?
Yes. I need to take him back to his world.
So you took my token, huh?
Hahaha! Of course, my power is way better than that poker-faced
dragon slayer… and definitely more useful than the riddler’s
Haha, no need to feel burdened by it.\.
I don’t care how you use it.\.
It’s in your hands now, and the choice is yours to make.
Alice? Alice, is that really you?\.
You’ve grown so much... I remember when you were this small.
Yeah, it’s been such a long time.\|
But... why are you still here?
It have been years after your story's end.\|
Shouldn’t your story have restarted by now?
Normally, yes. But for some reason, Ekros hasn’t reset it yet.
Maybe Odin’s actions disgusted him? It’s hard to say.
Oh, he’s from the same place I came from, and I’m helping
him find his way back home.
He took your token and wields its power to protect both himself and me.
Thank you for your power. It’s what kept me alive in this strange land.
And from the look in your eyes, I can tell it’s in the right hands.
Merlin, it’s been a long time. \|
I almost thought we’d never meet again.
Alice... You’ve come back to finish the last chapter of your
Yes, as the final part of Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland.
\.Little Alice will finally make her way home—safe, sound, and whole.
That was why you asked me to take on this identity, wasn’t it?
Indeed. You are unique, Alice. Unlike the rest of us, bound to
You’ve always had the power to break free.
It seems you’ve found another lost soul—a wanderer,
The tokens you bear... They’ve confirmed my theory.
They mimic the threads of fate, allowing even those outside the
But unlike us, you are not bound by destiny’s chains.\.
You walk freely through its paths without being ensnared by its traps.
May my wisdom guide you safely on the road that leads you home.
Well, look who’s back. I see you’ve come for another try.
\.I’m glad to see you haven’t given up.
I can see the determination in your eyes.
\.It’s good to see you’re more prepared this time.
Guess you’re not the type to quit after a little setback, huh?
You’ve grown far stronger than I imagined.
You’ve proven yourself.\. Not just in strength, but in resolve.
Alright, you win.\| Guess I won’t need to babysit you anymore.
Seriously, Robin?\. Can you stop talking for five seconds?
Thank you. \.All of you. I couldn’t have come this far without your
This was more than a test of power, Alice. \|
You’ve shown us your heart, and it’s strong enough to endure
We will support you however we can.
But remember, the fight with Ivaelon and Ekros will be far more dangerous.
Don’t get cocky, Alice. You’ve got a long road ahead.
\|But hey, if anyone can pull this off, it’s you.
And if things get messy, just remember how handsome your

and this sword has never failed me.
\.May they guard you as they have guarded me.

You can and you will. You’ll need them more than I do.
\|My strength is in knowing they’ll keep you safe.
This staff has channeled countless spells in my time.
\|Its magic is deeply attuned to me, but I believe it will resonate

I have put reflection spell on it.

Use it wisely, Alice. Magic can shape the world,
\|but it’s your heart that determines how.

except that one time, but I swear it wasn’t my fault!
